title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Deron Williams vs. Frank Gore
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Deron Williams vs. Frank Gore
description:
Sergio Mora is back this week as he and Chris are together in San Antonio and they run through all the biggest news of the week. Later, Chris talks with former NBA All-Star Deron Williams about his upcoming boxing match with former NFL star Frank Gore. Deron also reveals which current or former NBA player he might like to fight next.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
